statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_location
SELECT vehicle_id, status FROM vehicle_location ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC
SELECT location_lat, location_long FROM vehicle_location WHERE status = 'Active'
SELECT * FROM vehicle_location WHERE location_lat > 40
SELECT location_lat, location_long FROM vehicle_location ORDER BY location_long ASC
SELECT * FROM vehicle_location WHERE status='active';
SELECT vehicle_id, location_lat, location_long FROM vehicle_location ORDER BY location_lat DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM vehicle_location WHERE location_long < -80.0;
SELECT MAX(location_lat) AS max_lat, MIN(location_long) AS min_long FROM vehicle_location;
SELECT vehicle_id, location_long FROM vehicle_location WHERE status='inactive' ORDER BY vehicle_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_location WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT current_location, last_update FROM vehicle_location WHERE vehicle_id = 2;
SELECT status, battery_level FROM vehicle_status WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
SELECT vehicle_id, status, driver_id FROM vehicle_status WHERE battery_level > 50;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_location WHERE last_update > NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY;
SELECT vehicle_id, current_location, last_update FROM vehicle_location WHERE vehicle_id = 101;
SELECT status, battery_level, driver_id FROM vehicle_status WHERE status = 'Available';
SELECT vehicle_id, current_location FROM vehicle_location WHERE current_location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT vehicle_id, status, battery_level FROM vehicle_status WHERE battery_level > 50;
SELECT status, battery_level, driver_id FROM vehicle_status ORDER BY battery_level DESC, status ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, status FROM vehicles WHERE location_lat > 0;
SELECT driver_name, is_online FROM drivers ORDER BY driver_name DESC;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT vehicle_name, location_lat, location_long FROM vehicles WHERE status = 'available';
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, location_lat, location_long FROM vehicles WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT driver_name, vehicle_name FROM drivers JOIN vehicles ON drivers.vehicle_id = vehicles.vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE status = 'scheduled' ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT routes.route_id, routes.start_location, routes.end_location, drivers.driver_name FROM routes JOIN drivers ON routes.driver_id = drivers.driver_id WHERE routes.status = 'in_progress';
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name, vehicle_type FROM vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_type DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name FROM vehicles WHERE status='available';
SELECT vehicle_id, current_location FROM vehicles WHERE current_location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT vehicle_name, current_location, status FROM vehicles WHERE status='in repair';
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name, current_location FROM vehicles WHERE status = 'Available';
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT driver_name, contact_number FROM drivers ORDER BY driver_name ASC;
SELECT vehicle_name, vehicle_type, current_location, status, last_updated FROM vehicles JOIN vehicle_status ON vehicles.vehicle_id = vehicle_status.vehicle_id WHERE status = 'Under Maintenance';
SELECT * FROM vehicle;
SELECT vehicle_name, vehicle_type FROM vehicle WHERE status='active';
SELECT DISTINCT vehicle_type FROM vehicle ORDER BY vehicle_type DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, ST_AsText(current_location) AS location FROM vehicle WHERE status='available';
SELECT * FROM driver JOIN vehicle ON driver.vehicle_id = vehicle.vehicle_id WHERE driver.contact_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT * FROM vehicle ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, vehicle_type FROM vehicle WHERE status='active';
SELECT vehicle_name, current_location, status FROM vehicle WHERE vehicle_type='car' AND status='available';
SELECT driver_name, license_number, contact_number FROM driver ORDER BY driver_name ASC;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance, estimated_time FROM route WHERE distance > 100;
